## UVX vs PIPX

```bash
# Install a tool, e.g., black formatter
pipx install llm
# Run a tool once temporarily without installing
pipx run pycowsay hello

pipx list # list tools
pipx uninstall black # uninstall a tool 
```

```bash
# Install a tool, e.g., black formatter
uv tool install llm
# Run a tool once temporarily without installing
uvx pycowsay hello


uv tool list # list tools
uv tool uninstall black # uninstall a tool
```

## LLM(terminal) setup

- Copy Proxy token from here [aipipe](https://aipipe.org/login){target="_blank"}
- Export relvant environment variable [aipipe sannad repo](https://github.com/sanand0/aipipe){target="_blank"}
- `export OPENAI_BASE_URL=https://aipipe.org/openai/v1`
- Api key can be set permanently
   - ```bash
    hrm@bitnd:~$ llm keys set openai
    Enter key:
    ```

```bash
hrm@bitnd:~$ uv tool install llm
`llm` is already installed

hrm@bitnd:~$ export OPENAI_BASE_URL=https://aipipe.org/openai/v1
hrm@bitnd:~$ llm keys set openai
Enter key:

hrm@bitnd:~$ llm 'hi'
Hello! How can I assist you today?


hrm@bitnd:~$ llm -m 'gpt-4o-mini' 'hi'
Hello! How can I assist you today?
```
